mapper.select: select count(1) from t_course_chapter_video where is_delete = 0 and course_chapter_id = #{courseChapterId}

select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.course_chapter_id as courseChapterId,s.name as name,s.video_url as videoUrl, s.img_url as imgUrl,s.graphic_Details as graphicDetails,s.chapter_number as chapterNumber, cc.name as courseChapterName from t_course_chapter_video s left join t_course_chapter cc on s.course_chapter_id = cc.id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.course_chapter_id = #{courseChapterId} and s.chapter_number = #{chapterNumber}

select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.course_chapter_id as courseChapterId,s.name as name,s.video_url as videoUrl, s.img_url as imgUrl,s.graphic_Details as graphicDetails,s.chapter_number as chapterNumber, cc.name as courseChapterName from t_course_chapter_video s left join t_course_chapter cc on s.course_chapter_id = cc.id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.id = #{id}

select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.course_chapter_id as courseChapterId,s.name as name,s.video_url as videoUrl, s.img_url as imgUrl,s.graphic_Details as graphicDetails,s.chapter_number as chapterNumber, cc.name as courseChapterName from t_course_chapter_video s left join t_course_chapter cc on s.course_chapter_id = cc.id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.course_chapter_id = #{courseChapterId}

select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.course_chapter_id as courseChapterId,s.name as name,s.video_url as videoUrl, s.img_url as imgUrl,s.graphic_Details as graphicDetails,s.chapter_number as chapterNumber, cc.name as courseChapterName from t_course_chapter_video s left join t_course_chapter cc on s.course_chapter_id = cc.id where s.is_delete = 0
and s.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
